title: Exercise: Control Data Flow Using Custom Transformer Ports

questions.question: Consider the section of workspace shown above. If I select the three transformers highlighted with arrows and create a custom transformer, how many input and output ports will it have by default?
options: One Input and One Output port
One Input and Two Output ports
Two Input and Two Output ports
Two Input and Three Output ports

questions.question: Which of the following is not a way you can add a custom transformer to your workspace to reuse it?
options: Add it from the Transformer Gallery

questions.question: You can rename custom transformer ports from the Main canvas tab.
